body: Any new panics? It could be that this is due to the non-atomic pointer writes, fixed on the release branch and scheduled to be part of Go 1.5.2. If you can rebuild a custom Go version, use `git fetch origin release-branch.go1.5.2 && git checkout release-branch.go1.5.2` and try that. Otherwise, Go 1.5.2 will be out in a few weeks.
